overview: Azar is responsible for rural health at Qazvin and addresses various people’s problems. But Haj Kamal is a big obstacle in his way and does not allow things to go right. Haj Kamal is the head of the council and the big village, but because of Azar’s membership, he is not ready to convene a meeting. He believes that this is the work of men.

production_companies.name: The Documentary and Experimental Film Center (DEFC)

title: Goft-o-Go Dar Meh
